author: Special Correspondent
text: Thousands of aspirants participated in a job fair to select candidates for private sector companies, which was organised by the district administration in association with the Department of Employment and Training at N.P.R. College of Engineering and Technology in Natham near here on Saturday. Inaugurating the fair, Minister for Rural Industries and Labour Welfare P. Mohan said that the Department of Employment and Training had facilitated the recruitment of 1.32 lakh persons through special job fairs conducted for the private sector all over the State in the last four-and-a-half years.
title: Thousands take part in job fair
